TopicTitle: Have I been playing too much KSP?

Articles.Content:
I may have been playing too much KSP. I was backing a large (40  ft or 12 meter) vehicle into a parking space at work today that was on a slight slope and all I could think of as I watched my progress in ny mirrors was that I was "Falling back into the planet's gravity well"... What do you all think? Should I be checking to see if I'm turning green?

-K

I've been playing since 2014 and still look around at things that look like parts for rockets.

"Paint that orange and you've got a Rockomax fuel tank."

 

Also, high five fellow driver.
I think I can say I've played KSP too much, as I always try to reorient the camera or right-click on things while watching KSP videos.
This is a trick question.  There is no such thing as playing too much KSP.
